name: DyDo AI for Warzone 2100 RTS game
short_description: DyDo is an AI developed as "mod" of the freeware RTS game Warzone 2100. You can play with DyDo AI in skirmish and multiplay games. Warzone 2100 is a 3D real-time strategy game that was released in 1999. It's source code was liberated in december 2004.
